def.dt: :the act or process of separating :the state of being separated
:a point, line, or means of division
:an intervening space :gap the separation between wheel spokes
:cessation of cohabitation between a married couple by mutual agreement or judicial decree
:termination of a contractual relationship (as employment or military service)
:a form of anxiety experienced by a young child and caused by separation from a significant nurturant figure and typically a parent or from familiar surroundings
:a highway or railroad crossing using an underpass or overpass
